results.name: 2-adic valuation of tetrahedral numbers C(n+2,3) = n(n+1)(n+2)/6 = A000292.
comment: The subsequence of every other term (a(2n-1), n >= 1) is the ruler sequence A007814 = (0, 1, 0, 2, 0, 1, 0, 3, 0, 1, 0, 2, ...), in particular every fourth term is zero. The nonzero terms among them, a(4n-1) = A007814(2n) (n >= 1) have both their neighbors equal to one more than themselves, a(4n-2) = a(4n) = a(4n-1) + 1 = A007814(2n) + 1.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
